Original:
從開幕至今去過大概五六次，每次去都約來越失望，以前酒好喝也夠烈，即使高朋滿座也能感受到老闆們很熱情款待，服務也很好，食物因為是使用氣炸鍋，人多的時候等久一點也沒關係。從一開始一杯可以微醺，到後來喝了三杯依然無感，與我同行過的友人們也都有這樣的感覺，加上最近去發現菜單跟之前不太一樣，容量有變少，單價低但小杯，同樣的價位現在可以在東區獲得更好的選擇。
上上週與友人前往，整間店三組客人，卻發生找不到bartender 點餐，還有一次訂位了結果到了店門口發現內部整修不營業，讓人很無言。
一顆星是給真的好吃的雞翅跟薯條，還有80元的啤酒。現在看到即使週五週六也回不到過去的盛況，希望老闆可以正視一下這些問題。
EN:
I have been there about five or six times since the opening, and every time I go, I have been disappointed. In the past, the wine was good enough. Even Gao Peng could feel that the bosses were very enthusiastic and the service was very good. It doesn't matter if you wait for a long time.From the beginning, a cup can be slightly stunned, and after drinking three cups, I still have no feeling. Friends who have worked with me also have this feeling. In addition, I recently found that the menu is not the same as before. Low but small cups, the same price can now get better choices in the Eastern District.
Last week, I went with my friends. Three groups of guests in the whole store could not find Bartender to order. Another time I settled in the door of the store and found that the internal renovation was not open, which was very speechless.
A star is for really delicious chicken wings and fries, as well as 80 yuan of beer.Now seeing that even if I can't return to the past, I hope the boss can face up to these problems.

不會死鹹，風味卻十足，部位較肥，適合愛吃肥肉的朋友。(配啤酒很讚)

．香辣雞翅 $80
會有一點辣，雞翅醃得入味，用氣炸鍋料理出來的外皮脆而不焦，且多汁。(配啤酒一樣讚)

【服務態度】—5星
年輕的店員態度很好。

【價格c/p值】—5星
這個有幾星就要給幾星！這個價位真的無敵，太佛了。80元可以吃到5隻雞翅；同樣80元還有滿滿一大杯生啤酒。下次一定再來喝爆。

【用餐環境】—4星
稍微擁擠一點，但感覺滿有溫度的，喜不喜歡就見仁見智。

【綜合評分】—4.75星
忘記拍食物照了，下次來補上。
EN:
[Restaurant taste] - 5 stars
..Taiwanese beer 18 days of beer $ 80
In addition to sweet and smooth, the sweet fragrance of malt also drinks, which is really different from the glass bottle flavor bought in the supermarket.

..Salted pork $ 120
It will not die salty, the flavor is full, and the part is fat, suitable for friends who love to eat fat.(It's great with beer)

..Spicy chicken wings $ 80
There will be a little spicy, chicken wings are marinated, and the outer skin is crispy but not burnt and juicy.(Praise with beer as much)

【Service Attitude】 - 5 stars
The young shop assistant attitude.

【Price C/P value】 - 5 stars
A few stars will be given to this!This price is really invincible, too Buddha.You can eat 5 chicken wings at 80 yuan; the same 80 yuan and a large glass of raw beer.I will have to drink again next time.

【Dining Environment】 - 4 Star
Slightly crowded, but it feels full of temperature.

[Comprehensive scoring] - 4.75 stars
Forgot to take food photos, come to make up next time.
